name: The kuroiUI SDL-Windowing Library
short_description: kuroiUI (Japanese for "darkUI") is a C++ class-based library to add Windows forms-like controls (ie. windows, push buttons, checkboxes, etc.) to an SDL-based project. It is intended to cross-compile to most OSs which SDL supports (see www.libsdl.org).
